description: Increases your maximum melee hit, allowing you to deal more damage. Also a requirement for some weapons.

trainingMethods.name: Cows (Lumbridge - Aggressive/Strength Style)
itemsRequired: Any melee weapon (set to Aggressive or Strength style)

trainingMethods.name: Sand Crabs/Ammonite Crabs (Strength Style)
trainingMethods.location: Hosidius Beach (Sand Crabs), Fossil Island (Ammonite Crabs)
trainingMethods.notes: Very AFK combat training. Use Strength combat style.

trainingMethods.name: Slayer Tasks (Melee - Strength Style)
trainingMethods.notes: Trains Slayer alongside combat. XP rates depend heavily on the assigned monster.

trainingMethods.name: Nightmare Zone (NMZ - Dharok's Setup)
trainingMethods.notes: Very high AFK Strength XP by staying at 1 HP with Dharok's set effect.

trainingMethods.name: Animated Armour (Warriors' Guild)
itemsRequired: Full set of metal armour (e.g., Mithril, Adamant, Rune)
trainingMethods.notes: Decent AFK option, also a source of Warrior Guild tokens for defenders.
